ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup white or cider vinegar

cookingTips: Heat milk slowly to 86°F and maintain temperature for proper curdling
Use fresh, high-quality milk for best results
Drain curds thoroughly through cheesecloth for desired cheese consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cheesemaker through temperature control and the curdling process to achieve fresh cheese with ideal texture and flavor.
